profileText: a Representative from Texas; born in St. Louis, Mo., March 29, 1981; graduated from the Mary Institute and Saint Louis Country Day School, St. Louis, Mo.; B.A., Rhodes College, Memphis, Tenn., 2003; attended Thurgood Marshall School of Law, Texas Southern University, Houston, Tex.; J.D., University of Houston Law Center, Houston, Tex., 2006; lawyer, private practice; public defender, Bowie County, Tex., 2007-2010; member of the Texas state House of Representatives, 2021-2023; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
